sentences.en: ‘Silent movie’ is a misnomer since the movies usually had a musical accompaniment.
sentences.cn: “无声电影”这一名称不恰当，因为这类电影一般都有配乐。

sentences.en: Actually, " Underground " is a misnomer, because more than half the shops are above ground.
sentences.cn: 实际上, “ 地下 ” 这个名称用之不当, 因为半数以上的店铺是在地面上的.

sentences.en: First - class hotel'was a complete misnomer for the tumbledown farmhouse we stayed in.
sentences.cn: 把我们住的那个摇摇欲坠的村舍称作` 一流 旅馆 ',纯粹是乱用词语.

sentences.en: Garnett: Only talking about carbon emissions is actually a bita misnomer.
sentences.cn: 加内特: 只有谈论的碳排放量实际上是有点用词不当.

sentences.en: In fact, the term requirement a misnomer.
sentences.cn: 但实际上, “指令”这个术语是不正确的.

sentences.en: Lightning is a misnomer for that slow, old horse.
sentences.cn: [闪电]那匹慢吞吞的老马而言是名不符实.

sentences.en: PacePace can actually a bit a misnomer so be careful.
sentences.cn: 速度速度实际上有点用词不当所以要当心.

sentences.en: The simple answer: User - friendly is a misnomer and one that makes a complex situation seem simple.
sentences.cn: 简单的回答是: “界面友好”是个误解,令使用困难的也可能是简单界面.

sentences.en: This name is a misnomer and has inevitably gained a negative connotation.
sentences.cn: “暗池”这个名称用词不当,不可避免地产生了负面含义.

sentences.en: To call it a hotel is a misnomer -- it was more like a prison!
sentences.cn: 称它作旅馆是用词不当它更象一座监狱!

sentences.en: We also pointed out that dolphin - kicking is a misnomer.
sentences.cn: 我们同时指出,所谓的海豚式踢腿“ Dolphin -Kicking” 是一条错误的用词.

words.tran_cn: 用词不当；误称；写错姓名

trans.tran_cn: 使用不当的名字或名称
